Cassian, the leader of the werewolf contingent who appear at Redcliffe Castle if the Warden sides with the werewolves during Nature of the Beast, does not have an eye mesh assigned to his model; a second werewolf in the company also suffers from this omission. 



I've just added the missing mesh assignment to their character files.

State.Description: Four new talents for your dog. First two of them are passive, others are activated. In addition, dog gets a talent every 2nd instead of every 3rd level (this will work only for levels your dog will gain after this addin was installed).
State.Name: Extended Dog Talents

State.Author: Kuro_Neko
State.Description: Ever wonder why Alistair doesn't have his own Warden's Oath amulet?  Now he can.
State.Name: Alistairs Oath

State.Author: i9h
State.Description: Resolves several outstanding issues with the cutscene at [url=http://dragonage.wikia.com/wiki/Depths_of_Depravity#The_Nest]the end[/url] of Awakening.
State.Name: Awakening endgame cutscene fixes

Original.Name: Compatibility file for Grey Wardens of Ferelden-5864-1-0-1666901419.zip

State.Author: Ashhawk
State.Description: Makes the goblet behave correctly when wearing modded clothing or armour, puts gloves on the PC, allows replacement of Duncan's dagger, and fixes some other issues.
State.Name: Goblet De-Gobbler - a Joining chalice fix and more

State.Author: Luchaire
State.Description: Changes one of Dog\'s idle animations so he won\'t bark incessantly in camp all the time.
State.Name: Less barking dog

State.Author: Kronaras
State.Description: Bigger Witherfang
State.Name: Rescaled Witherfang

State.Author: Kuro_Neko
State.Description: Ever wonder why Alistair doesn't have his own Warden's Oath amulet?  Now he can.
State.Name: Alistairs Oath

State.Author: Bodge72
State.Description:
Among the last of the Elvhenan? At least you can look good with it.

3 presets for use with TMP's Elf Update or vanilla CC. Updated with NPC presets.
State.Name: Bodge72 Male Elf Presets Deluxe Edition

State.Author: Catachrism
State.Description: Lady of The Forest HD Retexture
State.Name: Lady of The Forest HD Retexture Catachrism

State.Author: CaldazarILIX
State.Description: Changes some dialogues during the mage origin.
State.Name: Mage Origin Dialogue Tweaks

State.Author: Catachrism
State.Description: Ogre HD Retexture by Catachrism, Lore friendly more detail than vanilla Ogre
State.Name: Ogre HD Retexture Catachrism

State.Author: Adrius
State.Description: A lore-friendly mod that adds the second moon, Satina to the night sky.
State.Name: Two Moons Circle

State.Author: Shanamah
State.Description: Warden stuff for your companions when they complete the Joining, from Grey Wardens of Ferelden or Thedosian Grey Wardens.
State.Name: Wardens' Joining

State.Author: Dheuster
State.Description: Allows you to make your pet mabari war dog a permanent 5th travelling companion.
State.Name: Extra Dog Slot

State.Author: FollowTheGourd
State.Description: Readability improvements for cutscenes, the quest journal, the codex, conversation history, tooltips, the inventory, and other various menus. There\'s still lots more to go and more versions to come.
State.Name: FtG UI Mod - More Readable Fonts and UI

State.Author: mrc136k
State.Description: Sentinels/Suits of armor do not bleed or leave a blood pool.
State.Name: Armors Do Not Bleed

Original.Name: (0.6) Riot Scene Tweaks and GW Justice-5944-0-6-1685130699.zip

State.Author: Shanamah
State.Description: Some small fixes and tweaks that I haven't yet found done by others.
State.Name: Awakening Fixes and Tweaks

State.Author: Dalishious
State.Description: Gives Tranquil NPCs the familiar brand from later games (specifically the DA:I design)
State.Name: Tranquil Brand 2.0

State.Author: Kaizoku-Gal
State.Description: Retexture for Duncan’s armor based on the Grey Warden armors from DA2 Legacy DLC.
State.Name: Duncan's armor Legacy inspired retexture

State.Author: lizardagger
State.Description: Eyes, eyelashes and a complexion for the DA toolset.
State.Name: Jeane eyes_eyelashes and complexion

State.Author: Taylor17387
State.Description: Brings the player from the entrance of the Deep Roads to the lair of the broodmothers automatically.
State.Name: Shortcut through the Deep Roads

State.Author: SammyJC
State.Description: A collection of textures and tints for use in the Dragon Age Toolset and in-game character creator.
State.Name: SJCs Tints And Textures

State.Author: hdhd
State.Description: This mod gives you the option to skip the Fade.
State.Name: Skip the Fade

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Equips Bann Teagan in all his appearances with consistent and (more) appropriate gear. Also addresses the variations in his descriptive floaty text.
State.Name: TSM Better Bannhammer - Teagan tweaks and fixes

State.Author: FollowTheGourd
State.Description: Use up to all fifty quickslots regardless of display resolution. Multiple rows. Row centering options.
State.Name: FtG Quickbar - Center and Multi Rows

State.Author: Lakia1250
State.Description: Allows you to get Schmooples without any requirements.
State.Name: A Nug for Leliana

State.Author: mintflavoredwindows
State.Description: A rewrite of the Awakening epilogue slideshow that attempts to stop it from conflicting with events and lore established in later games, along with implementing bugfixes and some new content for player choices that the developers overlooked
State.Name: Awakening Lore-Friendly Epilogue Rewrite

State.Author: LustyThedosianMaid
State.Description: Morrigan's Inquisition head mesh ported over to Origins.
State.Name: Morrigan -Inquisition Edition-

State.Author: Terra_Ex
State.Description:
CharGenMorph Compiler automates the process of merging chargenmorphcfg.xml files, searching through all override directories and reconstructing a singular "master" xml file containing all the values.



Gone are the days of manually editing xml files and painfully having to eyeball the differences between files - CharGenMorph Comp
State.Name: CharGenMorph Compiler

State.Author: Raughnut - Aranox
State.Description: Leliana's Armor from Sacred Ashes Trailer
State.Name: Lelianas True Sacred Ashes Armor

State.Author: averagedilflover
State.Description: Have you seen blood in this game and went "Wow! That really looks like blood!" ...I doubt it. Well, this mod tries to fix that!
State.Name: Blood Retexture

State.Author: Ashhawk
State.Description: Fixes a bug in the mod Pixelated Shaders Begone that stops the bloom shader working. (Alternatively, turns the bloom off more efficiently.)
State.Name: Bugfix for Pixelated Shaders Begone

State.Author: killerkoalas
State.Description: Because having blood all over your journal does not seem sanitary.
State.Name: Clean UI

State.Author: Ashhawk
State.Description: Removes restrictions on headmorphs in the Toolset: combine features, use features from all heads, put beards on all heads, and bypass feature snap in the CC. Restores unused sliders and makes hair selection easier.
State.Name: DAO Toolset Headmorphs Unlocked

State.Author: xSoullesx
State.Description: This mod adds a new sun retexture.
State.Name: Fantasy Sun

State.Author: MachDelta
State.Description: This is a quick and simple mod that changes the chances of melee kills becoming \"Deathblows\", aka those nifty scripted hack-em-up sequences!
State.Name: Forced Deathblows

State.Author: Elegant
State.Description: This fix will correct all problems caused by Law & Order but will only take effect if it is installed before the actual quest is accepted.
State.Name: Law and Order Fixes

State.Author: Keldorn
State.Description: Achieve levels up to 50, and get up to 6 specializations!
State.Name: Level50

State.Author: kayla
State.Description: Equips marjolaine with the marjolaine's recurve bow, as she fights empty handed which doesn't look right
State.Name: Marjolaine - with weapons

State.Author: Zanzuro
State.Description: Alters the 'Health' and 'Stamina/Mana' gauges of the party and summons to have higher contrast for more visibility.
State.Name: Perceptible Portraits

Original.Name: The Mystery of the Missing Kaddis Merchant Add-onx-4037-2-0.7z

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Four kaddis designs appear in the Dragon Age Toolset that were not implemented in the game. This mod makes them available. Each pattern comes in three colours (white/black/red) for a total of twelve kaddis. (Kaddii? Kaddises? Kaddisii?) Use the optional merchant add-on for immersive acquisition.
State.Name: TSM The Mystery of the Missing Kaddis

State.Author: Yonline2
State.Description: This hack removes the helmet graphic from party members by placing helmets in the invisible \"cloak\" equipment slot.  Item Sets fixed.  Awakenings compliant.
State.Name: No Helmet Hack 1_6

State.Author: AlexFaithman
State.Description: Unencrypted daorigins.exe for Steam users. Ready for use with Large Address Aware (4GB LAA patch) from Techpowerup.
State.Name: 4GB LAA patch compatible DAorigins.exe

State.Author: TheSapphireQueen
State.Description: Fixes Bioware's mistake where they mislabel a priest as a mage.
State.Name: A Priest - Not A Mage

State.Author: Cirosan
State.Description: Fixes bugs in Awakening banter. An optional version also removes the banters where Oghren sexually harasses Sigrun.
State.Name: Awakening Banter Fixes - Optionally Removes Sexual Harassment

State.Author: mintflavoredwindows
State.Description: Fixes an Awakening bug where the epilogue sometimes talks about the darkspawn messenger if you had him killed
State.Name: Awakening Messenger Bugfix

State.Author: Terra_Ex
State.Description: This mod fixes the infamous Silverite Mines equipment glitch that causes you to permanently lose some/all of the equipment on your player character. With this fix installed the scene involving the Architect & Utha will display correctly (not against a black backdrop) and your equipment will be correctly removed at the appropriate time.
State.Name: Awakening Silverite Mines Bugfix

State.Author: Bodge72
State.Description: Quite probably the best dwarf preset to date, or I'll eat my hat....
State.Name: Bodge72 The Ultimate Dwarf Preset

State.Author: SamuraZp
State.Description: (contains the mod) Adds a string, without animation, to bows and crossbow and changes the size of quivers in option
State.Name: Bowstring and Quivers

State.Author: HollownessDevoured
State.Description: This mod helps with inventory management, adds new weapon runes and other quality of life recipes. Don't want a particular recipe? Pick and choose the recipes that fit best for you!
State.Name: Recipe Expansion (Inventory Management and New Items)

State.Author: Yonline2
State.Description: This hack removes the helmet graphic from party members by placing helmets in the invisible \"cloak\" equipment slot.  Item Sets fixed.  Awakenings compliant.
State.Name: No Helmet Hack 1_6

State.Author: Cirosan
State.Description: Adds options to give Cailan a proper funeral WITHOUT requiring you to be Andrastian or venerate royalty. Return to Ostagar DLC.
State.Name: Cailan's Body - More Dialogue Options

State.Author: Cirosan
State.Description: Fixes pickpocketing or stealth quests from being locked forever if you don't have those skills the very first time you talk to Slim Couldry.
State.Name: Crime Wave Fix

State.Author: Catachrism
State.Description: Desire Demon Retexture 4k adult and lore friendly
State.Name: Desire Demon HD Retexture Catachrism

State.Author: Ashhawk
State.Description: Makes the goblet behave correctly when wearing modded clothing or armour, puts gloves on the PC, allows replacement of Duncan's dagger, and fixes some other issues.
State.Name: Goblet De-Gobbler - a Joining chalice fix and more

State.Author: PerdyNerdy
State.Description: Elven Orphanage changes the spirits in the Denerim Alienage Orphanage into elven spirits.
State.Name: Elven Orphanage

State.Author: Max
State.Description: Provides fixes for abilities which weren't covered in Dain's fixes. Shield Block, Stunning Blows, Combat Magic and Bear Shape(Shapeshifter spell).
State.Name: Forgotten Fixes

State.Author: danscott84
State.Description: Improved Stats for the Warden\'s Oath amulet
State.Name: Improved Warden Oath

State.Author: VagranDreamer
State.Description: The mod adds a new face morph and gives a completely new idea of the bard from Orlais. Contains 6 hair options.
State.Name: Leliana Appearance Overhaul

State.Author: VagranDreamer
State.Description: A new, more violent face for Oghren. Contains 3 hair options.
State.Name: Oghren Appearance Overhaul

State.Author: Qwinn
State.Description: New workaround hotfix for the rare but dreaded Skin Deep/Dereliction of Duty/Scrolls of Banastor bug.  You should install even if it hasn't affected you yet! This fixpack attempts to address ALL dialogue, quest, scripting, plot, and most item bugs in the base game of Dragon Age: Origins.  It also restores much previously inaccessible content.
State.Name: Qwinn's Ultimate DAO Fixpack v3.52

State.Author: ejoslin
State.Description: Fixes many dialog issues (not only Zevran), including Zevran giving the wrong dialog at the city gates, Alistair referring to himself as king when he's not, glitches in the Alienage as a city elf, and more
State.Name: ZDF Dialog Fix

State.Author: Schwinni
State.Description: Fixes the bug in Awakening that the High Dragon in the Dragonbone Wastes doesn\'t drop the Blackblade Gloves and Boots.
State.Name: Awakening Blackblade Armor Dragon Drop Fix

State.Author: Bleemak
State.Description: Allows you to hear more party barks in Awakening.
State.Name: Awakening Party Barks

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: This mod increases the number of items that have set bonuses, by allowing certain items to act as substitutes for others in sets, and by adding in some new sets. All features and specific items are optional, and can be removed at the user's discretion.
State.Name: Expanded Item Sets

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Adjusts Daveth's skills so they match his supposed abilities, and fixes a bug which gives Jory various archery talents.
State.Name: Daveth and Jory Ability Tweaks

Original.Name: Leliana Appearance Overhaul for DLC Leliana's Song-5857-1-0-1665908625.zip

State.Author: VagranDreamer
State.Description: The mod adds a new face morph and gives a completely new idea of the bard from Orlais. Contains 6 hair options.
State.Name: Leliana Appearance Overhaul

State.Author: VagranDreamer
State.Description: Loghain's new face with 3 hairstyle options.
State.Name: Loghain Appearance Overhaul

Original.Name: Make your companions very noisy and talkatives-4187-1-0.rar

State.Author: JiaJia
State.Description: Make your companions very noisy and talkative N always respond
State.Name: Make your companions very noisy and talkative

State.Author: lilhunnykt
State.Description: Updates all Halla in game to higher quality Inquisition assets.
State.Name: Updated Halla

State.Author: Talagen
State.Description: Different Morphs as Sten changes during game play.
State.Name: A year with Sten

State.Author: TheSapphireQueen
State.Description: Fixes Bioware's silly mistake of putting dwarves in mage robes.
State.Name: Dwarves Are Not Mages

State.Author: ejoslin
State.Description: Fixes many dialog issues (not only Zevran), including Zevran giving the wrong dialog at the city gates, Alistair referring to himself as king when he's not, glitches in the Alienage as a city elf, and more
State.Name: ZDF Dialog Fix

State.Author: jwvanderbeck
State.Description: This mod changes new character creation, so that the game will no longer assign certain abilities based on class and background.
State.Name: No Starting Abilities

State.Author: Craftian
State.Description: Say goodbye to all those blurry smears with a HD texture pack, upscaled by AI. Includes optional Reshade preset.
State.Name: Old Gods

State.Author: Dragonagefun whatrevolution
State.Description: Increase combat speed and retain Bioware's change to include dexterity attribute in dagger weapon damage. Includes original mod author's optionals, and adds more. Combat is made faster by increasing weapon attack speeds. Attacks occur faster, therefore animations play faster.
State.Name: Origins Faster Combat with Dexterity

State.Author: Berry
State.Description: A remaster of the Inquisition vallaslin for Origins, with hand painted fixes that make the tattoos clear and fit on the face properly
State.Name: Inquisition Dalish Vallaslin Remastered

State.Author: blaidd
State.Description: This is a tiny Mod which removes pixelation when Bloom, Depth of Field are applied. No more ugly pixels in front of your face!
State.Name: Pixelated Shaders begone

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Replaces the heavy helmet worn by the Ostagar Tower Guard temporary companion with a medium helmet, to accomodate his insufficient strength to equip the former.
State.Name: TSM Better Tower Guard

State.Author: amcnow
State.Description: Provides the skills needed to respec the six primary attributes as well as classes and abilities.
State.Name: Respecification DAO

State.Author: LukeCypher
State.Description: If you've got Golems in your army, they're supposed to show up in the cutscene where all your forces march towards Denerim. But there's a bug that prevents this from happening. This mod fixes that bug. Now, if you have Golems in your army, they will show up in the cutscene.
State.Name: Army Golem March Bug Fix

State.Author: Metalunacy
State.Description: Allows you to successfully persuade the peasants without Varel claiming you gave in to them, and thus giving you the bad epilogue slide.
State.Name: Awakening Riot Scene Persuade Fix

State.Author: Bodge72
State.Description: Who says male Dwarves have to be ugly? 9 presets to allow you to give your Dwarf Warden drop dead gorgeous looks including 5 NPC morphs.
State.Name: Bodge72 Male Dwarf Presets Deluxe Edition

State.Author: i9h
State.Description: Sigrun or Velanna can now undergo the Joining ritual if they are recruited as part of the third (and last) main quest.
State.Name: Joining ritual fix for Awakening companions

State.Author: Kesaru
State.Description: This mod removes the racial restrictions on player voice sets.
State.Name: Universal Voices

State.Author: rosvitacousland
State.Description: Im Mittelalter gab es bekanntlich keine Grauhörnchen. Also habe ich das werkseitige Grauhörnchen umgefärbt, damit es möglichst wie ein richtiges Eichhörnchen aussieht. Tauscht sämtliche Grauhörnchen im Spiel gegen rötliche Eichhörnchen.
State.Name: Eichkater

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Makes the difficult-to-obtain Ceremonial Armored Gloves a guaranteed drop from the Assassin Leader in the Forest Stream random encounter.
State.Name: TSM Unhand Those Gloves

State.Author: TheGreenTaurus
State.Description:
Has it ever bothered you that spells like Chain Lightning, the elemental Storms and Shapeshifting all take a bit too much time preparing?

Well, it did bother me, and I did something about it!
State.Name: Faster Spellcasting

State.Author: WJill aka Jill Waterhouse
State.Description: Morrigan, Leliana and Sten (inspired by the "Sacred Ashes" trailer), handsome Alistair, glorious Zevran, concept-inspired Wynne, adorable Oghren, the spirit of Justice in the flesh and DAI inspired Flemeth default face replacements. Check it out!
State.Name: Sacred Ashes Team And More - SATAM - (Morrigan - Leliana - Sten - Alistair - Zevran - Wynne - Oghren - Justice - Flemeth) Replacement

State.Author: commanderstrawberry
State.Description: LOD2 for the beard of Schwarzalbenheim dwarf male mod
State.Name: Schwarzalbenheim LOD2 - Dwarf Male Beard Level of detail files
